name: Trump RPG -The Fart of the Deal
name_original: Trump RPG -The Fart of the Deal
description:
Description:

You ARE the President of the United States.

Welcome to the Trump Circus! Battle world leaders such as Justin Trudeau, Kim Jong-Un and Vladimir Putin and more! Can you make a deal and find the Sacred MAGA room to MAGA?

- Wander the halls of the White House

- Play a Round of GOLF at Mar-a-Lago

- Send a Tweet or Declare WAR!

- Turn Enemies into Allies...

Embrace the HATE!

This is a work of PARODY, any similarity to any real or fictional person or events is clearly in your mind!

I tried to include every "personality", but the news cycle changes so frequently that its hard to keep up.

Instructions: Make sure to download both the exe file and the zip file. Then extract the zip file to the same folder as the exe file. The zip file is required to save the game.

If you have any comments/reactions/requests/whatever, please leave them in the comments below.
